alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cameron; Inland Cameron (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 11:52PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Cameron County through 1230 AM CDT... At 1151 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over La Paloma Elementary School, or over La Paloma, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Harlingen, San Benito, La Feria, Los Fresnos, Rancho Viejo, Rio Hondo, Los Indios, Southmost, Rangerville, South Padre Island, and Olmito. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
